## Contract Description
Transport Canada requires professional services to conduct motor vehicle collision and motor vehicle equipment defect investigations across Canada. This will involve selective inquiries related to motor vehicle safety in Canada as and when required. Up to six contracts will be recommended for award for services required in six provinces across Canada, with a minimum of two investigators physically located in each province. The contract duration will be from 1 October 2023 to 31 March 2025, with an option to extend the contract term by up to four additional one-year periods and a six-month transition period under the same terms and conditions.

## Contract Requirements
- The selected vendor will be required to conduct motor vehicle collision and equipment defect investigations.
- The selected vendor will also provide selective inquiries related to motor vehicle safety in Canada.
- A minimum of two investigators are required to be physically located in each province.
